mamun777- glad things are working out for you. 

To tag my movies, I use Subler (http://code.google.com/p/subler/) which, in case it matters, is Mac-only.

ScubaSteve- I can understand the curiosity. :)

Things in my queue for when I'm back home, mainly bc I wanna reencode in 1080p:

Most def (over the next 2-3 months):
-Kung Fu Panda 2
-The Matrix Trilogy
-Avatar (Collector's Edition)
-The Star Wars saga
-All Pixar films (except Finding Nemo)
-Batman Begins/The Dark Knight
-The Lord of the Rings (Extended)

Maybe (3-4 months?):
-King Kong (2005) (Extended)
-The Avengers 'prequels' (aka Iron Man 1&2, The Incredible Hulk, Captain America, Thor)

[all listed in the order in which I'm *planning* to do them. lol.]

Of course, those are all meant to be in-between the recent stuff we're all waiting to see...

Thanks man :)
